definition: we are honored by your presence
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
surname Jia
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
light/ray/CL:道[dao4]/bright/only/merely/to use up
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: In particular, I'd like to thank Ms.
sentences.chinese: 我特别感谢凯兰女士大驾光临。

sentences.english: I opened the door, and there was Tom as big as life.
sentences.chinese: 我打开门，原来是汤姆大驾光临。

sentences.english: I'm looking forward to seeing him on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我期待他周五大驾光临。

sentences.english: We look forward to welcoming you at the APDXC in Osaka, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 我们期待你大驾光临日本大阪参加亚太地方DX大会。

sentences.english: We look forward to having you with us tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们期待着您今晚大驾光临。

definition: (polite) excuse me for not going out to meet you
imperial chariot/(fig.) emperor/(polite) you
Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling/see also 蓬蓽生光|蓬荜生光[peng2 bi4 sheng1 guang1]
(polite) your business/what brings you?
to grace sb with one's presence/your arrival (honorific)/your esteemed presence
failure to meet/(humble language) I'm sorry not to have come to meet you personally
I have been looking forward to meeting you for a long time (idiom)
to do sb the honor (of attending etc)/to put in an appearance/to show up
honorific: I've long looked forward to meeting you./It's an honor to meet you at last.
I have been enlightened by your teaching (humble)
please forgive me
(polite) do me the honor
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
nice to meet you
(literary) I trust you have been well since we last met
infrequent visitor
